TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit AsyncResult extends System.Object implements class System.IAsyncResult, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink
Public Class AsyncResult Implements IAsyncResult, IMessageSink
type AsyncResult = class interface IAsyncResult interface IMessageSink

summary.span: 封装对委托的异步操作的结果。

span.span: Encapsulates the results of an asynchronous operation on a delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与使用委托进行异步方法调用结合使用。The class is used in conjunction with asynchronous method calls made using delegates. 从委托的返回`BeginInvoke`方法可强制转换为。The returned from the delegate's `BeginInvoke` method can be cast to an . 具有属性，保存委托对象上调用异步调用。The has the property that holds the delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked. 有关详细信息`BeginInvoke`和异步调用使用委托，请参阅[异步编程使用委托](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md)。For more information about `BeginInvoke` and asynchronous calls using delegates, see [Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来获取，以及如何在委托上等待的异步调用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 此示例由两个类，包含方法以异步方式调用的类和类，其中包含`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

related.span: 使用委托进行异步编程

span.span: Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AsyncDelegate As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ AsyncDelegate { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在其上调用异步调用的委托对象。

span.span: Gets the delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.

value.span: 在其上调用异步调用的委托对象。

span.span: The delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以强制转换为用户定义的委托的实际类。The property can be cast to the actual class of the user-defined delegate. 例如，如果用于进行异步调用的委托的类型`MyDelegate`，必须将此属性返回的委托转换为`MyDelegate`。For example, if the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous call is of type `MyDelegate`, the delegate that is returned by this property must be cast to `MyDelegate`. 回调方法然后调用该委托的`EndInvoke`具有正确签名，以获取结果的异步方法调用的方法。The callback method can then call the delegate's `EndInvoke` method with the correct signature, in order to obtain the results of the asynchronous method call. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可以获取用来进行异步调用，若要调用的委托`EndInvoke`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous call, in order to call `EndInvoke`. 示例强制转换，这是唯一的参数的回调方法中，为对象。The example casts the , which is the only parameter of the callback method, to an object. 此示例由两个类，包含方法以异步方式调用的类和类，其中包含`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息的方式此回调示例工作原理，以及更多来异步调用方法的示例使用委托，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information on the way this callback example works, and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/callback.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/callback.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/callback.vb#5)]

Public Overridable Function AsyncProcessMessage (msg As IMessage, replySink As IMessageSink) As IMessageCtrl

span.span: The request interface.
The response interface.
Implements the interface.
No value is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接口不是与相关类。The method of the interface is not relevant to the class. 通过实现引发。Implementation by throws a . 相反，获得通过强制转换使用委托进行的异步调用返回的接口。Instead, obtain an by casting the interface returned by an asynchronous call made using a delegate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AsyncState As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ AsyncState { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取作为 方法调用的最后一个参数而提供的对象。

span.span: Gets the object provided as the last parameter of a method call.

value.span: 作为 方法调用的最后一个参数而提供的对象。

span.span: The object provided as the last parameter of a method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`BeginInvoke`方法，请参阅[异步编程使用委托](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md)。For more information about the `BeginInvoke` method, see [Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于将信息传递给回调方法。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used to pass information to a callback method. 最后一个参数`BeginInvoke`方法调用是一个格式字符串，该回调方法用来设置输出消息的格式。The last parameter of the `BeginInvoke` method call is a format string, which the callback method uses to format an output message. 此示例由两个类，包含方法以异步方式调用的类和类，其中包含`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息的方式此回调示例工作原理，以及更多来异步调用方法的示例使用委托，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information on the way this callback example works, and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/callback.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/callback.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/callback.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AsyncWaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: virtual property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ AsyncWaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取封装 Win32 同步句柄并允许实现各种同步方案的 。

span.span: Gets a that encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and allows the implementation of various synchronization schemes.

value.span: 封装 Win32 同步句柄并允许实现各种同步方案的 。

span.span: A that encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and allows the implementation of various synchronization schemes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此方法在异步操作完成后自动发出信号。The returned by this method is automatically signaled when the asynchronous operation has completed. 在调用时，不会自动关闭等待句柄`EndInvoke`上用于进行异步方法调用的委托。The wait handle is not closed automatically when you call `EndInvoke` on the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous method call. 如果释放对等待句柄的所有引用，则当垃圾回收功能回收此等待句柄时将释放系统资源。If you release all references to the wait handle, system resources are freed when garbage collection reclaims the wait handle. 若要完成使用等待句柄时，就立即释放系统资源，请调用方法。To free the system resources as soon as you are finished using the wait handle, call the method. 显式关闭或释放可释放对象时，垃圾回收的工作效率更高。Garbage collection works more efficiently when disposable objects are explicitly closed or disposed. > [!CAUTION] > 中包含属性可用于异步调用完成之前阻止当前线程。The contained in the property can be used to block the current thread until the asynchronous call is complete. 但是，将忽略，如果在指定了`BeginInvoke`调用。However the will ignore the , if one was specified during the `BeginInvoke` call. 因此，这种情况可以出现在其中应用程序关闭之前已完成执行，即使使用到块，直到异步调用完成。Therefore, a situation can occur where the application shuts down before the has finished executing, even if a is used to block until the asynchronous call completion. 这种情况的示例，请参阅的示例类，并删除语句。For an example of such a situation, see the example for the class, and remove the statement. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来获取，以及如何在委托上等待的异步调用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 此示例由两个类，包含方法以异步方式调用的类和类，其中包含`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 调用是否同步完成。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the call completed synchronously.

value.span: 如果 调用同步完成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the call completed synchronously; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它检测到的`BeginInvoke`调用以同步方式在完成委托，它是可能的线程中调用 BeginInvoke 是当前线程。If it is detected that the `BeginInvoke` call completed synchronously in the delegate, it is probable that the thread that called BeginInvoke is the current thread. 大多数提供程序的接口将不使用该功能并将返回默认`false`。Most providers of the interface will not use the capability and will return a default `false`. 当前实现始终返回`false`。Current implementation of always returns `false`.

summary.span: 获取异步调用的响应消息。

span.span: Gets the response message for the asynchronous call.

returns.span: 一条远程处理消息，表示对远程对象上的方法调用的响应。

span.span: A remoting message that should represent a response to a method call on a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可返回的对象后调用方法。The method can return an object after the method is called. 返回值可以转换为。The return value can be cast to an . 但是，不需要直接调用这些方法之一。However, you do not need to call either of these methods directly. 它们仅供使用的.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构。They are intended for use by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsCompleted As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsCompleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示服务器是否已完成该调用。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the server has completed the call.

value.span: 服务器完成该调用后，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: after the server has completed the call; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器必须使用外部议定的任何客户端提供资源后它会设置共享语义属性设置为`true`。The server must not use any client supplied resources outside of the agreed upon sharing semantics after it sets the property to `true`. 因此，它是安全的客户端后销毁资源属性返回`true`。Thus, it is safe for the client to destroy the resources after the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性返回的`BeginInvoke`来发现异步调用何时完成。The following example shows how to use the property of the returned by `BeginInvoke` to discover when an asynchronous call completes. 从服务于用户界面的线程执行异步调用时需要执行此操作。You might do this when making the asynchronous call from a thread that services the user interface. 对完成情况进行轮询允许在 线程中执行异步调用时继续执行调用线程。Polling for completion allows the calling thread to continue executing while the asynchronous call executes on a thread. 此示例由两个类，包含方法以异步方式调用的类和类，其中包含`Main`进行调用的方法。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关详细信息和使用委托来以异步方式调用方法的更多示例，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/polling.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/polling.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/polling.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现接口。The method implements the interface. 不需要直接调用此方法。You do not need to call this method directly. 它被用于.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构上。It is intended for use by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework. 使用者代码将调用委托。 invokes the consumer code's delegate. 它还设置返回实例方法。It also sets the instance returned by the method. 如果`msg`参数的类型是，返回相同对象。If the `msg` parameter is of type , the same object is returned by . 否则，返回一个包含远程处理异常的答复消息。Otherwise, a reply message that contains a remoting exception is returned. 此外会修改返回的值属性。 also modifies the value returned by the property.
